tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FoodRecallSystem (
  id INT,
  product_name VARCHAR,
  batch_number VARCHAR,
  contamination_level INT,
  recall_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    contamination_level VARCHAR(50),
    recall_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE recalls (
    recall_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT REFERENCES products(product_id),
    recall_reason TEXT,
    recall_date DATE,
    recall_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Product (
  product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  manufacturer TEXT NOT NULL,
  production_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE,
  contaminated BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Recall (
  recall_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  recall_reason TEXT,
  recall_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Product(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RecallLog (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  recall_id INT,
  log_entry TEXT,
  log_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Product(product_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (recall_id) REFERENCES Recall(recall_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Product (
    product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    recall_date DATE,
    reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Recall (
    recall_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT REFERENCES Product(product_id),
    contaminant_id INT REFERENCES Contaminant(contaminant_id),
    recall_date DATE,
    reason TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE product (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    manufacturer TEXT,
    expiration_date DATE,
    is_contaminated BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE recall (
    recall_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    reason TEXT,
    date_issued DATE
)

CREATE TABLE manufacturer (
    manufacturer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    country TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE contact_person (
    person_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE product_location (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    location_name TEXT,
    city TEXT,
    state TEXT
)
